reasons_to_visit.details: June features the magical Five-Petalled Rose Festival, celebrating Český Krumlov's medieval heritage with period costumes and activities.
Warm, pleasant temperatures ideal for exploring the castle, wandering medieval streets, and river activities.
The baroque castle gardens are at their most beautiful with full blooms and perfect conditions for exploration.
Prime time for Vltava River rafting and canoeing with ideal water levels and weather conditions.
Long summer days provide excellent lighting for photographing the UNESCO World Heritage architecture.

reasons_to_avoid.details: The Five-Petalled Rose Festival brings significant crowds, especially during the main festival weekend.
June marks the beginning of peak season with higher accommodation and dining prices.
Popular restaurants and accommodations require reservations well in advance during festival time.
